text:
S1-7 and S2), could it be considered that the main difference is that non-employees carry out core
activities of the company and employees of the value chain only accessory or supply activities?
ESRS Reference
ESRS S1 paragraph 4, AR 3, and AR 62; ESRS S2 paragraph 4, and AR 3
Key terms
Value chain workers; non-employees
